feed.title: Investment Rationale
feed.subtitle: After realizing that keeping track of my own ideas with so much noise, I have decided to document them and put them on this blog. Easy to access and in public (since no one else would ever read it anyways)

entry.title: Trip Advisor
entry.content:
Priliminary reasons to look at TripAdvisor

Covid has clearly brought down the whole travel industry, including TA. However, this is Liberty Media Company subsidiary. Even when the whole of travel industry is still struggling it has turned the corner and has returned a positive FCF in second quarter of 2021.

** Annual Report 2020 **

Quarter 2

Add analysis here
entry.summary: Priliminary reasons to look at TripAdvisor
